Listing the unknown—checklist of liverworts and hornworts of Laos
Article
Full-text available
  • Dec 2020
  • Lars Söderström
  • Anders Hagborg
  • Tamás Pócs
  • Matt von Konrat
We report the first checklist of liverworts from Laos. Only 66 species are known from the country, in addition to three unconfirmed and three rejected reports. Eight taxa have been published with types from Laos, two of them invalidly. Not a single hornwort has been reported from the country.

Cook Islands Bryophyte Flora
Project
The bryophyte flora of the Cook Islands group is poorly documented. This project aims to bring together existing information, undertake field work on the islands with the long-term goal of formally documenting the bryophyte flora of the Cook Islands.
